itemFluff.name: Adventurer's Ring
entries: Lamps are a liability on adventures. Delicate and prone to oil spillage, lamps fill a hand that should otherwise be wielding a weapon or casting a spell. Once you try one of our elegant and practical rings, you'll never go back to cumbersome flint and fire.

itemFluff.name: Axe Beak
entries: {@i Don't let the grouchy reputation of these hardworking creatures deter you. A team of axe beaks can pull your sled with remarkable speed and efficiency.}

itemFluff.name: Bright Fungal Cloak
entries: {@i Never spelunk in the dark again! This cloak of bioluminescent fungus fibers is sure to brighten your day.}

itemFluff.name: Covered Wagon
entries: {@i Is it any wonder adventurers flock to the Dalelands? It's not just the majestic forests and flavorful ale; here, everyone minds their own business. These wagons, popularized by adventurers current and retired, can be found from Thunder Pass to Dragon's Reach.}

itemFluff.name: Desert Clothing
entries: {@i Stylish but practical, our desert clothing protects you whether you're taking a caravan of camels through the Calim Desert or exploring an ancient Mulhorandi tomb.}

itemFluff.name: Devil Mask
entries: {@i Grant your sins plausible deniability by wearing one of these diabolical masks inspired by fiends from the Nine Hells. Also suitable for patriar galas in the city of Baldur's Gate.}

itemFluff.name: Flying Snake
entries: {@i Our partners in the Zhentarim provide these remarkable pets, fully domesticated and trained to deliver messages. Always wear gloves when handling venomous creatures.}

itemFluff.name: Garb of Light and Shadow
entries: {@i These outfits are fashionable among fey courtiers in the Moonshae Isles. After winning a riddle game and parting with a lock of hair, I secured enough samples to re-create them in my workshop.}

itemFluff.name: Genie Robe
entries: {@i Channel the authority of genies with these elegant Calishite fashions.}

itemFluff.name: Locking Spellbook
entries: {@i The wise wizard keeps a copy of all their spells safely tucked away in case of disaster. We supplement our spellbook with a trusty lock secure enough to dissuade curious goblins.}

itemFluff.name: Monster Camouflage
entries: {@i The people of Icewind Dale have developed many strategies for safely traveling in dangerous wilderness. This outfit, adapted from hunting garb, deters strangers and animals alike.}

itemFluff.name: Musical Instrument
entries: {@i The yarting is the staple stringed instrument of minstrels across Faer√ªn. A cittern, distinguished by its pear-shaped bowl, produces a pleasing, richer sound. The bandore is a complex bass instrument with additional sets of strings, perfect for accompanying tenor and alto instruments in an ensemble.}

images.title: Left to Right: Yarting, Bandore, Cittern

itemFluff.name: Prosthetic Limb
entries: {@i A perfect illustration of the notion that magic should make our lives easier. Thanks to the generosity of Sultana Songal, anyone who requires a Prosthetic Limb can have the device for free. Speak to one of our vendors in the Aurora's Emporium nearest you.}

itemFluff.name: Sled Dog
entries: {@i We recommend a team of these sled dogs to ease the burden on individual animals. Rotate your dogs through the lead positions to give weary animals a rest.}

itemFluff.name: Warm Fungal Clothing
entries: {@i Intrepid explorers from Highplume Station in Icewind Dale have descended steam vents to bring useful fungi up from the Underdark. Our expert crafters took it from there.}

itemFluff.name: Winter Camouflage
entries: {@i Whether you're hiding from horrifying tundra monsters or you just want a little privacy, this handsome garb can help you keep a low profile in the North.}
